百夫长技能:

  Skills:
  - "message{m=&&c&l幻界百夫长&e&l即将对&b&l<mob.tt.top>&e&l释放&d&l剑气斩!} @PlayersInRadius{r=10}"
  - potion{type=SLOW_DIGGING;duration=10;level=138} @Self
  - potion{type=SLOW;duration=70;level=6} @Self
  - potion{type=JUMP;duration=70;level=138} @Self
  - effect:particles{p=portal;a=1100;hS=0.1;vS=0.1;speed=2} @Self
  - delay 60
  - "projectile{onTick=能量1;onHit=冲击2;v=20;i=1;hR=1;vR=1}"
  - delay 6
  - "projectile{onTick=能量1;onHit=冲击2;v=20;i=1;hR=1;vR=1}"
"能量1":
  Skills:
  - effect:particles{p=largeexplode;a=12;hS=0;vS=0} @origin
"冲击2":
  Skills:
  - percentDamage{percent=0.3;i=true}
